channel.title: Positioning Interfaces?
channel.description:
Okay, I have learnt how to make interfaces. As I was wondering how to from my last post in this section and I've come across a small but minor problem. I've started the Enchant Crossbow Bolt interface and I tested it. Loads up great. All images show fine.
The interface isn't positioned properly. I was wondering how I would go about position it from this:
[img]http://img526.imageshack.us/img526/7312/positioning.png[/img]
To putting it in the centre of the gameplay screen.
Thanks - Future Reference.

item.title: Positioning Interfaces?
item.dc:creator: @SmDaRgOn SmDaRgOn
item.description:
@SmDaRgOn wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:2, topic:339810”]if you made this with lin’s interface maker, when you go to generate code, it think itll ask for the x and why positions (if its not a sidebar interface)

so youll probably have to work it out by trial and error.[/quote]

Thanks. I had already fixed it though.

Thanks anyway.
